PHRASE.LANG: Small deadly robots controlled by their masters, the Cybermen, largely impervious to bullets, they move silently then jump on their victims. BBC logo © BBC 1996. Petits robots mortels contrôlés par leurs maîtres, les Cybermen, en grande partie résistants aux balles, ils se déplacent silencieusement puis sautent sur leurs victimes. BBC logo © BBC 1996. Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Cyberman image © BBC/Kit Pedler/Gerry Davis 1966. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]

Kleine tödliche Roboter, die von ihren Herren, den Cybermen, kontrolliert werden und weitgehend kugelsicher sind. Sie bewegen sich ganz leise und springen dann auf ihre Opfer. BBC logo © BBC 1996. Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Cyberman image © BBC/Kit Pedler/Gerry Davis 1966. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]

Piccoli e letali robot controllati dai loro padroni, i Cybermen, sono immuni ai proiettili e si spostano silenziosamente fino ad assalire le loro vittime. BBC logo © BBC 1996. Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Cyberman image © BBC/Kit Pedler/Gerry Davis 1966. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]

Pequeños robots mortales controlados por sus maestros, los Cybermen, e inmunes a las balas. Se mueven en silencio y después saltan sobre sus víctimas. BBC logo © BBC 1996. Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013.
